text.merenc.config.boots: Merge Frost Walker with Depth Strider Enchantments
text.merenc.config.silkTouch: Merge Silk Touch with Fortune Enchantments
text.merenc.config.protection.tooltip: when is true, you can combine all the protection enchantments no matter the level. [default = yes]
text.merenc.config.bow.tooltip: when is true, you can combine all the bow enchantments no matter the level. [default = yes]
text.merenc.config.crossbow.tooltip: when is true, you can combine all the crossbow enchantments no matter the level. [default = yes]
text.merenc.config.weapon.tooltip: when is true, you can combine all the sword and axe enchantments no matter the level. [default = yes]
text.merenc.config.trident.tooltip: when is true, you can combine all the trident enchantments no matter the level. [default = yes]
text.merenc.config.boots.tooltip: when is true, you can combine all the boots enchantments no matter the level. [default = yes]
text.merenc.config.silkTouch.tooltip: when is true, you can combine all the tools with silk touch and fortune enchantment. [default = yes]
key.merenc.title: Merge Enchantments
